sagano.name: Sagano Bamboo Forest
sagano.description: A magnificent Bamboo forest in the district of Arashiyama, west to Kyoto, Japan.

sequoia.name: Giant Sequoia National Monument
sequoia.description: The forest is named for the majestic Giant Sequoia trees which populate 38 distinct groves within the boundaries.

redwood.name: Redwood National Park
redwood.description: The Redwood National parks is a combination of four parks that together protect 45% of all remaining coast redwood old-growth forests, totaling at least 158 square km.

black-forest.name: Black Forest
black-forest.description: Schwarzwald or “Black Forest” is a wooded mountain range in Baden-Württemberg, southwestern Germany.

crooked-forest.name: Crooked Forest
crooked-forest.description: A grove of oddly-shaped pine trees. This young forest was planted around 1930 and has about 400 pines.
